description: Length of n-th run of identical symbols in A026465.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (group)a026490 n = a026490_list !! (n-1)a026490_list = map length $ group a026465_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 15 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
